categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic Special Forces units

nodes.text: Taskforce Shen was a SpecForce unit in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. The unit was composed of two Infiltrator platoons, a Pathfinder platoon, and two technical squads.
Taskforce Shen was primarily active in the Mid Rim region.
Members of Taskforce Shen included the commanding officer Major Mart Stevez, First Lieutenant Vu Nin, and Lieutenant Mishowan Shigormallan.
